segments.text: Pardon me . Does your hotel have a fitness facility ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . We try to anticipate all our guests ' needs , including fitness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , the gym is just below the lobby . You can take the elevator or the stairs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to pay extra ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , sir . It's gratis . Just take your room key so you can get in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll be happy to know that it's open 24/7 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but no . We used to have a trainer , but then he had an unfortunate accident .
segments.speaker: S2
